text: Kendra Wilkinson claims to still be good friends with Hugh Hefner, the man that not only let her live at his Playboy mansion for three years, but also made her a reality star with The Girls Next Door. But it's hard to tell the blonde bombshell has any regard for the publishing mogul by the way she talks about their former romance. When appearing on Kocktails With Khloe on Wednesday evening, the 30 - year - old described how she went out of her way to step out on the publishing mogul, who will turn 90 - years - old next month.
